message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be open to $100?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I was really hoping to get closer to my minimum price. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at 110? I think it's a fair compromise.
